page.title: 18SMEATHARPE-FOR RETIREMENT?
page.content: Many people retire to rural areas similar to Smeatharpe. Certainly here there is less crime than urban areas. However, perhaps the effect on men of retiring from a life-time of paid em- ployment is under-estimated, but sadly many die within 3 years. This can leave a widow isolated, often hundreds of miles from family and friends. Urban life in fact has many advantages for the senior citizen - cheap public transport, reduction in theatre and cinema tickets, lunch clubs, meals on wheels, cheap rates at hair-dressers, chiropody, dental and health services within easy access. These can be in- valuable at the time of life when people have more leisure time, less money and possibly more health problems.
